jobDescription: Description:Experienced in HPLC, dissolution; Strong in Analytical Research & Development.Responsible for assisting in method development, trouble shooting, data reviewing, performing laboratory research and/or routine sample analysis on API and solid oral dosage form under minimal guidance of a supervisor.Experiences with contract lab/manufacture management.
